Synopsis: Uploads one or more files and creates a vector store.
Description: The Add-OAIVectorStore function is a simple workflow using Invoke-OAIUploadFile and New-OAIVectorStore to upload files to OpenAI and create a vector store.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Add-OAIVectorStore -Path "C:\Files"
This example uploads all the files located in the "C:\Files" directory to OAI and creates a vector store.
